thread.title: It Took Less Than 3 Minutes for The Oscars to Call Trump a RACIST
thread.title_full: It Took Less Than 3 Minutes for The Oscars to Call Trump a RACIST

author: Top Right News
title: It Took Less Than 3 Minutes for The Oscars to Call Trump a RACIST
text:
Email 
by Brooke Bosca | Top Right News 
Despite being the choice of 99.99% of Hollywood, Hillary Clinton got humiliated by Donald Trump in a historic upset last November. 
Hollywood still doesn’t seem to get it…assuming that the vast majority of Americans agree with their political views. We don’t. 
But that didn’t stop Oscars host Jimmy Kimmel from pulling the race card on our new president — less than 3 minutes into his 2017 monologue: 
Kimmel: “Maybe this is not a popular thing to say but I want to say thank you to President Trump. I mean, remember last year when it seemed like the Oscars were racist? That’s gone now” Kimmel’s got the Trump jokes! #oscars pic.twitter.com/wtAzYCOqNB
